movies.title: One on One
movies.plot: Macak (The Cat) is the best basketball player around the blocks of New Belgrade. Meanwhile, his friend is bullied by a local gangster Coma, whom he owns money. To pay off his debt, Macak will play 1 on 1 with the rival player, eventually winning it. However, Coma doesn't stand on his promise, so Macak decides to solve this problem the other way.
movies.simplePlot: Macak (The Cat) is the best basketball player around the blocks of New Belgrade. Meanwhile, his friend is bullied by a local gangster Coma, whom he owns money. To pay off his debt, Macak ...

biography.bio: Zoran Cica was born in 1981 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Coriolanus (2011), One on One (2002) and Kosarkasi (2005).
biography.name: Zoran Cica

biography.bio: Branko Bojovic is an actor, known for System (2017) and One on One (2002).
biography.name: Branko Bojovic

biography.bio: Born in Belgrade, 1974. His father was a Martial ars instructor, and he started to learn at the early age of 3 years. He finished the Faculty of Psychical culture, and is also a Martial arts master 3.dan. of Aikido. His debut in theatre came in 1992 ("Majka Hrabrost"), and in a movie in 1994 - Third Time Lucky (1995).
biography.name: Zeljko Bozic

biography.bio: Zoran Cvijanovic was born on January 25, 1958 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Joli village, jolie flamme (1996), Ivko's Feast (2005) and Mile vs. tranzicija (2003).
biography.name: Zoran Cvijanovic

biography.bio: Vladan Dujovic was born on June 15, 1963 in Pec, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Ringeraja (2002), Natasha (2001) and The Knife (1999).
biography.name: Vladan Dujovic

biography.bio: Branislav 'Ciga' Jerinic was born on March 20, 1932 in Kragujevac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Iznenadna i prerana smrt pukovnika K.K (1987), Three (1965) and Golubovica apoteka (1999). He was married to Slavka Jerinic. He died on June 27, 2006 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Branislav 'Ciga' Jerinic

biography.bio: Ivan Jovic is an actor, known for Chernobyl Diaries (2012), Artilheiro (2012) and One on One (2002).
biography.name: Ivan Jovic

biography.bio: Dusan Kecman is the Serbian basketball superstar. He plays both shooting guard and small forward position. Kecman's shot at glory began at smaller Belgrade club Beopetrol. He became a full superstar and national team conteder in the Partizan club.
biography.name: Dusan Kecman

biography.bio: Sonja Kolacaric was born on May 4, 1980 in Lazarevac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Frozen Stiff (2002), Charleston & Vendetta (2008) and Accroché au ciel (2000). She is married to Andrej Ivancevic. They have one child.
biography.name: Sonja Kolacaric

biography.bio: Relja Milankovic is an actor, known for One on One (2002).
biography.name: Relja Milankovic

biography.bio: Zivojin 'Zika' Milenkovic was born on January 26, 1928 in Nis, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Porodicno blago (1998), Srecni ljudi (1993) and Strangler vs. Strangler (1984). He died on March 18, 2008 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Zivojin 'Zika' Milenkovic

biography.bio: Dusan Pocek was born on May 29, 1932 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Srecni ljudi (1993), Bolji zivot (1987) and Paviljon VI (1978). He died on March 18, 2014 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Dusan Pocek

biography.bio: Andrej Sreckovic is an actor, known for Absolute Hundred (2001), One on One (2002) and Crni u dusi (2001).
biography.name: Andrej Sreckovic
